snippet: Tuesday’s highlights from around the Web include one man’s experiment to teach a homeless person to code and research that showed that Yahoo sites received more visits than Google and Facebook sites in July.
abstract: Tuesday’s highlights from around the Web include one man’s experiment to teach a homeless person to code and research that showed that Yahoo sites received more visits than Google and Facebook sites in July.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Homeless Coding, and Yahoo Gets More Visitors Than Google
